text: Discover your voice.

Bernyce:
We have six young ladies

who have come together
to produce a film
for Hispanic Heritage Month.

Angel:
My name is Angel Ruben
and I am a musician.
I play the flute, piccolo,

alto sax, the clarinet,
and piano.

Dina:
My name is Dina De La Rocha,

and I am a talent development
specialist for Radio Disney.

The thing I've learned
about my own voice

is not to compare myself
to everyone else.

Don't ever think
that the level you're at
is never good enough.

It's always good
for where you're at.

Dawn:
My name is Dawn Sol√©r,

and I'm Senior
Vice President of Music

within
the Walt Disney Company.

Do you have any advice
to musicians out there?

The biggest advice
is practice every day.

It's like a muscle.
You have to work out every day.

And write.
Write as much as you can.

I'm really thankful
for the mentors

that came here
to help me find my voice

and become a more
well-rounded musician.
Wow. That's great.

Girl:
Descubre tu voz.

Announcer:
Follow their journey.
Discover your voice.

Hispanic Heritage Month
on Disney Channel.
